db.name: Boathouse Restaurant
db.address: 40 Lily Road, APSC, 36 Thao Dien, Q. 2

more.about: Offering absolute Saigon riverfront al fresco dining. New American, Mexican, Seafood, International Grill menu with a large kids selection! Extensive Cocktail and Wine List with reasonable pricing. Weekday Happy Hour from 4:30pm - 6:30pm with LIVE Music Tuesday - Sunday! A perfect getaway from the Saigon hustle.
